description: Made with movement and comfort in mind, our Women’s Hudson Trail Fleece Full Zip Up gives you the best of both. Super soft recycled brushed wool fleece helps keep you warm while the stretchy Merino-blend fleece panels give you room to move more comfortably. And with two pockets in the front, you’ve got just enough room for your favorite trail snacks.
name: Hudson Trail Fleece Full Zip - Womens

specs.value: 45% Recycled Wool, 45% Polyester, 5% Nylon, 5% Other Fibers
